title: Google\Cloud\Recommender\V1\Recommendation
name: Recommendation
description:
A recommendation along with a suggested action. E.g., a rightsizing recommendation for an underutilized VM, IAM role recommendations, etc

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.recommender.v1.Recommendation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Name of recommendation.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Free-form human readable summary in English. The maximum length is 500 characters.

params.name: data.recommender_subtype
params.description: Contains an identifier for a subtype of recommendations produced for the same recommender. Subtype is a function of content and impact, meaning a new subtype might be added when significant changes to content or primary_impact.category are introduced. See the Recommenders section to see a list of subtypes for a given Recommender. Examples: For recommender = "google.iam.policy.Recommender", recommender_subtype can be one of "REMOVE_ROLE"/"REPLACE_ROLE"

params.name: data.last_refresh_time
params.description: Last time this recommendation was refreshed by the system that created it in the first place.

params.name: data.primary_impact
params.description: The primary impact that this recommendation can have while trying to optimize for one category.

params.name: data.additional_impact
params.description: Optional set of additional impact that this recommendation may have when trying to optimize for the primary category. These may be positive or negative.

params.name: data.priority
params.description: Recommendation's priority.

params.name: data.content
params.description: Content of the recommendation describing recommended changes to resources.

params.name: data.state_info
params.description: Information for state. Contains state and metadata.

params.name: data.etag
params.description: Fingerprint of the Recommendation. Provides optimistic locking when updating states.

params.name: data.associated_insights
params.description: Insights that led to this recommendation.

params.name: data.xor_group_id
params.description: Corresponds to a mutually exclusive group ID within a recommender. A non-empty ID indicates that the recommendation belongs to a mutually exclusive group. This means that only one recommendation within the group is suggested to be applied.

methods.name: getRecommenderSubtype
methods.description:
Contains an identifier for a subtype of recommendations produced for the same recommender. Subtype is a function of content and impact, meaning a new subtype might be added when significant changes to content or primary_impact.category are introduced. See the Recommenders section to see a list of subtypes for a given Recommender.

Examples: For recommender = "google.iam.policy.Recommender", recommender_subtype can be one of "REMOVE_ROLE"/"REPLACE_ROLE"

Generated from protobuf field string recommender_subtype = 12;

methods.name: getXorGroupId
methods.description:
Corresponds to a mutually exclusive group ID within a recommender.

A non-empty ID indicates that the recommendation belongs to a mutually exclusive group. This means that only one recommendation within the group is suggested to be applied.

Generated from protobuf field string xor_group_id = 18;
